attributes.action: National Holiday to celebrate the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The government should put this in place to give the people of the United Kingdon an opportunity to say thank you to all the brave men and women of the NHS who have helped fight on the front line against Coronavirus.
attributes.background: I wish for the Government or Parliament to put in place a national day of celebration (once we've got through Coronavirus) so the United Kingdom can come together to celebrate the incredible servents of the NHS and their efforts during the coronavirus crisis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
